summary: Admin-only Android leave register app for a shop owner/manager to manage employees and record/search leave entries with persistent storage, simple navigation, and optional export/reporting.
architectural_notes: Admin-only application; no employee authentication/login flows required.
Target platform: Android phones; prioritize simple navigation across Home, Add Leave, Search, Employees.
Data persistence required across restarts; storage can be local-first or simple cloud-backed.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimalist logo mark with clean typography (sharaffiya-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Simple flat header illustration featuring a small shop and a calendar motif, minimal professional palette (leave-header-illustration.dim_1600x600.png)

existing_features.title: Add admin-only access control: only an Admin (Owner/Manager) can access and modify data; no employee login flows should exist.
Create the core navigation optimized for Android phones with clear screens: Home, Add Leave, Search, Employees, and per-employee Leave History.
Employee Management UI: allow admin to add and view employees with fields Employee Name (required), Employee ID (optional), Phone Number (optional), Department/Section (optional).

Leave Entry UI: allow admin to add a leave entry by selecting an employee from the employee list, choosing a leave date via calendar picker, selecting leave type (Full Day/Morning Half/Evening Half), and optionally entering a reason.
Leave Records & Search: implement a Search screen that filters leave entries by Employee Name and date range (fromâ€“to) and displays results showing Employee Name, Date, and Leave Type.
Leave History View: implement an employee-wise leave history page with a monthly view summary (including monthly leave count per employee).
Edit & Delete: allow admin to edit or delete any leave entry from search results and from the employee leave history view.
Apply a simple, clean, professional UI theme with minimal colors, optimized for Android phone readability; enforce consistent typography, spacing, and component styling across all screens.
Optional export: add an export function to download leave data as a file (CSV required; PDF optional if feasible) filtered by the current search criteria or by employee history view.
Set the app title and user-facing branding text to "Sharaffiya Market Leave Register" in the UI.
Generate and include basic visual assets: a minimalist app logo and a simple header illustration consistent with the chosen theme, and render them from static assets in the frontend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Admin-only access (no employee login) with full control over employees and leave records
Employee management: add/view employees with optional fields (ID, phone, department/section)
Leave entry: create leave for selected employee with date picker, leave type (full/morning half/evening half), optional reason
Leave records & search: filter by employee name and date range; display name/date/leave type results
Leave history views: per-employee leave history page and monthly summary view
Edit and delete functionality for leave entries
Persistent data storage using local storage or a simple cloud database (data survives app restart)
UI/UX: simple clean professional design; easy navigation (Home, Add Leave, Search, Employees); optimized for Android phones; beginner-friendly screen structure
Optional: export leave data to Excel/PDF and provide monthly leave count per employee
Implement persistent backend storage for Employees and Leave Entries in the single Motoko actor, supporting create/read/update/delete (CRUD) operations and search queries needed by the UI.
